paper_abstract: We consider the problem of minimizing the weighted sum of job completion times on a single machine (subject to certain job weights) with an additional side constraint on the weighted sum of job completion times (with respect to different job weights). This problem is NP-hard, and we provide a polynomial time approximation scheme for this problem. Our method is based on Lagrangian relaxation mixed with carefully guessing the positions of certain jobs in the schedule.
paper_title: The constrained minimum weighted sum of job completion times problem
